channel.title: Project 16 doesn't work
channel.description:
ok, this is the problem: i double click start server and it says "exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server"
any1 have an idea what's wrong? thx in advance

item.title: Project 16 doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Er, ok, but thats very strange… are the files compiling?
Project16 is worth getting to work for the base of a server

item.title: Project 16 doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @dreadlord375 dreadlord375
item.description:
@dreadlord375 wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:8, topic:30974”]Project 16 only comes with the source files. You have to compile them then it works.

See the “-g:none” line and “nowarn” in your batch file? Remove those but leave the rest of that line.[/quote] i removed the g:none and nowarn, but i still get the problem
and im not sure what u mean with sourcefiles but i guess it’s just the basics and u have 2 add the rest by urself, if so, thx for ur help but im not that good in programming so ill try another server

Read full topic

item.title: Project 16 doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Project 16 only comes with the source files. You have to compile them then it works.

See the “-g:none” line and “nowarn” in your batch file? Remove those but leave the rest of that line.

item.title: Project 16 doesn't work
item.dc:creator: @dreadlord375 dreadlord375
item.description:
@dreadlord375 wrote:

@echo off
title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE
color 0c

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now compiling server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

javac -g:none -nowarn -d ./Class/ ./Java/*.java

echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo /
echo / Now starting server…
echo /
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server
pause

that’s what in it

Read full topic
